item.title: Ill dont get xp?
item.dc:creator: @mod_lol1 mod_lol1
item.description:
@mod_lol1 wrote:

I want to added the same skilling place in allstarscape in my server…so I found a tutorial and it said:

 makeGlobalObject(XXXX, YYYY, 2193, 0, 10);// Chest

ok I did and I got the chest.

it needs to give xp if u click on it so I had to add this:

case 2193: if (actionTimer == 0) { addSkillXP((1700 * playerLevel[11]), 11); addItem(892, 100); addItem(995, 1000000); sendMessage("You Gain Some FireMaking, and get some Cash, and Arrows!."); setAnimation(733); actionTimer = 15; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } break;

I dont know if I added this in the correct place but it gives no errors.
I did compile but if I click on the chest it says nothing interessting happens or something…so it doesnt work…whats wrong!?
in what place I need to add that or I need to add more till it gives xp…?

Read full topic
